alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 3:27PM MDT until May 09 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Kimball County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Western Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... Northeastern Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 326 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hawk Springs Recreation Area to 6 miles northeast of Hillsdale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... La Grange, Albin, Meriden Rest Area and Gun Barrel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
